ing: 1 tablespoon granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "A sweet, creamy ricotta-based spread that's good on bread or as a fruit dip."
ins: Mix together the ricotta cheese, orange juice, sweetener, honey, and dry milk powder in a small bowl until the mixture forms a spreadable, even texture. Refrigerate leftovers.
